metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Remote user interacts with a cloud application
metadata.ns:textName: AC03 Social Engineering Against Remote User
metadata.ns:textReviewSolution: Apply security awareness (cloud application); Apply security training (remote user);
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: Remote user suffers from Social Engineering attacks, performed by third-party adversary (e.g. including the cloud application into phishing schema)
